attributes.action: use his influence to request that the Highways Agency reduce the speed limit on the A449 between Ombersley and Claines, Worcestershire, to 50 mph and to introduce measures to ensure that the road is made safer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This notorious stretch of road has claimed the lives of 12 people in the last 9 years with 69 casualties in that period. It is currently a 70 mph stretch, despite there beings schools, pedestrian crossings, farm openings and right turns across the road. A local petition recently attracted 2000 signatures.
